item.title: Beyond a warming fingerprint: individualistic biogeographic responses to heterogeneous climate change in California
item.description: Related materials How good is #species diversity as a surrogate for conserving other #biodiversity dimensions? We find that #conservation plans targeting species diversity also preserve much of #phylogenetic and #functional diversity.
